com.googlecode.aluminumproject.parsers.xml

Class XmlParser

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.googlecode.aluminumproject.parsers.xml.XmlParser
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ConfigurationElement, Parser

    public class XmlParser
extends Object
implements Parser
    Parses templates from XML files.

    By default, the names of templates should include their extensions. If all of the templates have the same extension, it might be worth the while to configure this extension using the "parser.xml.template_extension" configuration parameter. If a template extension is given, it will be appended (separated by a dot) to all template names.

    To support a custom naming strategy in templates, the XML parser allows a template name translator to be configured (using the "parser.xml.template_name_translator.class" configuration property). If no template name translator is configured, the default template name translator will be used.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String TEMPLATE_EXTENSION
      The name of the configuration parameter that is used to set the default extensions of templates.
      static String TEMPLATE_NAME_TRANSLATOR_CLASS
      The name of the configuration parameter that holds the class name of the template name translator that should be used.
